0.user_question: The great dragon, Perg, sat high atop mount Farbo, breathing fire upon anything within a distance of 1000 feet.  Polly could throw the gold javelin, the only known weapon that could sleigh the dragon, for a distance of 400 feet, well within the reach of the dragon's flames.  But when Polly held the sapphire gemstone, she could throw the javelin 3748668 times farther than when not holding the gemstone. If holding the gemstone, how far outside of the reach of the dragon's flames could Polly stand and still hit the dragon with the gold javelin?

ost_step.1: Without the gemstone, Polly can throw the javelin up to 400 feet away from Mount Farbo without getting caught in the dragon's range. This means that if we subtract this number (400) from the maximum safe distance near the mountain before reaching into its dangerous zone (which starts exactly 1 kilometer or about 3280 feet), then it would tell us the furthest point around the base of Mt. Farbo safely out of Drakulandia’s firespout radius — which turns out to be approximately **(3280 – 400) ~=** *2880* feet according to our calculations above!  🔥

direct_answer.text:
Let's multiply the increased throwing power provided by polly due to the use of Sapphire Gemstone i.e., [3748668]x[the original Javelin Throw Distance]. Thus;
\[ThrownDistanceWithGemStone = 400 \times 3748668\]<|end_of_document|>

Well I believe you can figure out what happens next... Of course! With the help of our magical gemstone, Polly would indeed hold the sword over quite literally thousands of miles away--which means beyond any reasonable scope or even possibility. 0.user_question: The great dragon, Perg, sat high atop mount Farbo, breathing fire upon anything within a distance of 1000 feet.  Polly could throw the gold javelin, the only known weapon that could sleigh the dragon, for a distance of 400 feet, well within the reach of the dragon's flames.  But when Polly held the sapphire gemstone, she could throw the javelin 3748668 times farther than when not holding the gemstone. If holding the gemstone, how far outside of the reach of the dragon's flames could Polly stand and still hit the dragon with the gold javelin?

1.subquestion: How far could Polly throw the javelin without any extra power from the sapphire gemstone?

subanswer.text: Without the influence of the sapphire gemstone, Polly throws the javelin a distance of 400 feet. The answer is 400.
